SEARCH

Class Inventory

java.lang.Object
Inventory
public class Inventory extends Object
Inventory class manages the collection of food and gift items for a pet. This class handles adding, removing, and using items, as well as maintaining lists of available random items that can be added to the inventory.
Author:
Group78

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Inventory()
    Constructs a new Inventory with empty food and gift lists.

  • Constructor Details

    • Inventory

      public Inventory()
      Constructs a new Inventory with empty food and gift lists. Initializes the available random food and gift items.

      Checks if a specific food item exists in the inventory.

      Returns:

    • useFood

      public void useFood(Food food)
      Uses a food item from the inventory, increasing the pet's fullness. Removes the food item from inventory after use.
      Parameters:
      food - The Food item to use

    • useGift

      public void useGift(Gift gift)
      Uses a gift item from the inventory, increasing the pet's happiness. Removes the gift item from inventory after use.
      Parameters:
      gift - The Gift item to use

    • clear

      public void clear()
      Clears all items from the inventory.
